Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging Reference /
Chapter 3 - ColorSync Manager Reference for Applications and Device Drivers / Constants and Data Types

Profile Location Constants

In most cases, a ColorSync version 2.x profile is stored in a disk file. However, to support special requirements, a profile can also be located in memory or in an arbitrary location that is accessed by a procedure you specify. The next sections describe ColorSync Manager constants for working with profiles that are stored in each of these locations.

Subtopics

Profile Location Structure
Specification for a File-Based Profile
Specification for a Handle-Based Profile
Specification for a Pointer-Based Profile
